files.patch:
@@ -3,1 +3,1 @@
-This is a testing tool developed to support ad-hoc testing of JavaFX controls.
+This is a testing tool developed to support manual ad-hoc testing of individual JavaFX controls.
@@ -43,3 +43,0 @@
-## Contact
-
-andy.goryachev@oracle.com

@@ -2,3 +2,0 @@
-<!-- Copyright Â© 2016-2023 Andy Goryachev <andy@goryachev.com> -->
-<!-- original source: https://github.com/andy-goryachev/FxTextEditor/blob/master/build.xml -->
-
@@ -6,2 +3,2 @@
-This build requires javafx.home property, pointing to javafx SDK (20+) directory, e.g.:
-  ant -Djavafx.home=<dir>
+This build requires javafx.home property, pointing to JavaFX SDK (20+) directory, e.g.:
+  ant -Djavafx.home=<DIR>
@@ -32,0 +29,1 @@
+		<mkdir dir="dist" />
@@ -94,1 +92,1 @@
-		<copy file="build/jars/${TARGET}.jar" todir="." />
+		<copy file="build/jars/${TARGET}.jar" todir="dist/" />
